net.sf.jclec.realarray.rec

Class BLXAlphaCrossover2x2

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.base.AbstractRecombinator
      • net.sf.jclec.realarray.RealArrayRecombinator
        • net.sf.jclec.realarray.UniformCrossover
          • net.sf.jclec.realarray.rec.BLXAlphaCrossover2x2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure, net.sf.jclec.IRecombinator, net.sf.jclec.ITool, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC

    public class BLXAlphaCrossover2x2
extends net.sf.jclec.realarray.UniformCrossover
    BLXAlpha crossover that generates two descendants from a pair of parent solutions.

    Paper: L.J. Eshelman, J.D. Schaffer, "Real-coded genetic algorithms and interval-schemata. Foundation of Genetic Algorithms 2, Morgan Kaufmann., San Mateo, pp 187–202, 1993.

    HISTORY:

    • (AR|JRR|SV, 1.0, March 2018) First release.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aurora Ramirez (AR), Jose Raul Romero (JRR), Sebastian Ventura (SV)

    Knowledge Discovery and Intelligent Systems (KDIS) Research Group: http://www.uco.es/grupos/kdis

    See Also:
    UniformCrossover2x2, Serialized Form
